title: Weeding Brochure: Wedding invitation gallery, customization requests, and contact for hardcopy

requirements.text: Set up the website branding and global layout for the site name “Weeding Brochure”, including a responsive header/nav, footer, and consistent typography and spacing across all pages.

quotes: the website name is weeding brochure

acceptanceCriteria: Site title/branding displays “Weeding Brochure” in the header and in the document title
Layout is responsive for mobile and desktop
Header includes navigation links to at least: Gallery, Customize, Contact

requirements.text: Implement an invitation card gallery/catalog page that displays wedding invitation card images with basic metadata (e.g., design name) and supports viewing a larger preview of a selected design.

quotes: weeding invitation cards with images which customer also seen

acceptanceCriteria: Gallery page shows a grid/list of invitation designs with thumbnails
Clicking/tapping a design opens a larger preview (modal or dedicated detail section/page)
At least 8 sample designs are available using static assets

requirements.text: Add a “Customize” flow where a customer can select a design and submit their customization requirements (e.g., names, date, venue, additional notes) using an English-language form.

quotes: customised their own weeding invitation cards with their requirements

acceptanceCriteria: Customize page contains a form with fields for key wedding invitation details and a free-text requirements field
Customer can optionally choose a design from the gallery to associate with the request
All user-facing form labels, buttons, and validation messages are in English

requirements.text: Persist submitted customization requests in the Motoko backend so that requests are not lost on page refresh, including timestamp and the selected design identifier (if any).

quotes: customised their own weeding invitation cards with their requirements

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes methods to create and list customization requests
A created request includes: createdAt timestamp, customer-provided fields, and optional selected design id/name
Requests remain available after reload/reopen (stable storage)

requirements.text: Connect the frontend customization form submission to the backend persistence API and show a clear submission success state and error state.
acceptanceCriteria: Submitting the form calls the backend and creates a stored request
On success, the UI shows a confirmation message and clears or resets the form
On failure, the UI shows an English error message and does not lose the entered data

requirements.text: Create a Contact section/page for hardcopy requests that prominently displays the Gharpic designer owner contact phone number “9824469590” and includes a click-to-call link on mobile devices.

quotes: also want a hardcopy then contact with the gharpic designer owner the contact number is 9824469590

acceptanceCriteria: Contact page clearly shows: “Gharpic designer owner” and phone number “9824469590”
Phone number is a tel: link (click-to-call on supported devices)
Contact page is accessible from the header navigation

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, attractive visual theme for a wedding invitation brand (not using blue & purple as the primary palette), including a hero section on the home page and consistent styling of cards, buttons, and form elements.

quotes: Create a attractive website of weeding invitation cards

acceptanceCriteria: Theme is consistent across Gallery, Customize, and Contact pages
Primary palette avoids blue & purple as the dominant colors
Home page includes a hero section introducing wedding invitation cards and a call-to-action to view the gallery

requirements.text: Add the generated image assets to the frontend as static files and render them in the UI (home hero and gallery) without routing image delivery through the backend.
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated
Gallery uses these static assets for thumbnails/previews
Home hero uses a generated banner image

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor (no additional backend services).
Do not edit files in frontend immutablePaths (compose existing UI components instead).
Do not use external databases or third-party authentication providers (Internet Identity is the only supported auth, and is not required unless explicitly added later).
nonGoals: Online payments or checkout for invitation orders
Real-time chat or messaging with the designer
Admin dashboard unless explicitly requested later
